item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Bottles (C & D) or (C, D, E & F) Lower Cargo Compartment Distribution Networks – One Network Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided procedures are established and used to verify associated lower cargo compartment remains empty, or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.

numlitem.para: Associated lower cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard near discharge switch on fire control module located on the pilots overhead panel:
Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
